title: Were-Dinosaurs: Cavern of Storms
description: Alex’s town of Buckland, Montana is gearing up for its 150th anniversary celebration, but everyone’s festivities are about to be upended by an approaching storm – a storm that’s ALIVE!Talk about the ELEMENT of surprise . . .Join Alex, Julia, Roy, & Tilly as they deal with school, identical twin ninjas, and a madman bent on resurrecting the past at any cost, but they’ll find out when you mess with the Triceratops, you get the horns.Tri as they may, tri as they might!
author: S.B. Clark
